title: Stop or there will be consequences: Manipur CM after Armyman is shot at
selftext: When elections come around, politicians divide you based on your caste and religion for their own gains. Once they win, they ignore the rifts they created in society, but this has a backlash that is quite evident in the current situation, where no one is willing to take responsibility for what they have done to the state.
comments: Looks like armories have been looted as well!!
